name: DropYourTalent.com
overview:
DropYourTalent LLC is a California-based entertainment company which operates one of the largest online talent communities that targets all types of talent around the world, operating under the name DropYourTalent.com.

DropYourTalent provides service to two different types of clientele; their members and advertisers.

Memberships are completely free and DropYourTalent.com does not charge any monthly fees for continuing members. Benefits of becoming a member include online promotion, industry networking and education. In addition to providing a gateway for people to self-promote and network with other talented members around the world, DropYourTalent adds an educational blog for members to gain insider perspective into becoming famous. DropYourTalent provides interviews, advice articles, an important event calendar and product reviews allowing each member to gain knowledge directly from entertainment industry experts.

As of today, ad space is being offered on DropYourTalent.com at competitive prices. The company offers potential advertisers the opportunity to market their products and services to a large group of visitors at a cost-effective rate. The current visitor demographics are primarily females between the ages of 13 and 29. DropYourTalent.com receives its primary traffic from North America, Europe and Asia, more recently with a spike in visitor traffic from the United States.
